casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Jose F. NAVARRO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2017 Richard E. Condon, Jr., senior assistant, public defender, in support of the petition. James A. Killen, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 496 , 160 A.3d 444 (2017), is denied.
